attributes.action: Save Rohingya from Burmese military and police and politician
attributes.additional_details:
Please save Rohingya from Burmese military and police and politician and require urgent assistance and Humanitarian aid.

Security force with Rakhine loot, fire and burn of Rohingya property under Act 144.
Police and a group of Rakhine started arson attack, looting properties, destroying houses and killing the innocent Rohingya girl and men. Nearly 1000 houses burnt down in Sittwe, over 100 killed, more than 300 wounded.100 Rohingyas killed and 500 wounded in Maungdaw. Rakhine set on fire Sawsawna village..Security personnel and Rakhine kill Rohingya, burn the house within the curfew period.Peaceful demonstration in Maungdaw, two killed, some wounded.10 Muslims massacre pictures distributing in northern Arakan.
